title: Client's company logo
content:
My client does not know what font was used to create his logo. Now I have to create a bigger version but there are no vector / psd files. Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803042742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_5533.png)

Font: 

 ITC Eras 

Solved By: 

 [defiantone](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803042742/http:/typophile.com/user/206966 "View user profile.")
